constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 6 (Monday, January 10, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 6368.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H9]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the Chairman of the Council of the District of Columbia to transmit Acts of the District of Columbia to Congress in electronic form.
